spiritsExplanation: The metadata indicates a mix of 'High-Energy & Intense' and 'Structured & Disciplined' workout spirits. Other spirits such as 'Flow & Rhythm' or 'Soothing & Restorative' are not applicable here as the focus is on structured HIIT movement rather than flow or relaxation.
